segments.text: Hello . I'd like to have my nails manicured .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This way please . We offer multiple manicure services here . Do you want a full service ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't need the full service .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But the full service will make your nails look much prettier and it is on discount now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thanks . All I need is painting and polishing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Please sit down . I hope you will be satisfied with our service .
segments.speaker: S1
